messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
What's the todo item I made yesterday?
It seems there are no todo items or reminders created yesterday in your records. If you meant a different date or need reminders from another timeframe, please let me know!
That's strange, I thought I had one.

It’s possible there was a mix-up with the date or the reminder might have been created on a different day. Could you provide any details you remember about the todo item, such as a keyword in its content or an approximate time it was created? This may help me find it more accurately for you.
I’m not sure about keywords but it was definitely created yesterday.

Thank you for clarifying. Just to make sure we're aligned: when you say "yesterday," do you mean the full 24 hours of the previous calendar day (from midnight to midnight, in your local time)? Also, could you confirm your time zone or the city you’re in? This will help me ensure I’m searching the correct time frame for your reminders.
I’m not sure about the exact time zone, but it was during the previous day, just as the full calendar day.

Thank you for clarifying! I searched for reminders created during the full previous calendar day, but I couldn't find any for "yesterday." It's possible your reminder was created on a different day, or there might have been an issue with saving it.

Would you like me to search within a broader range of dates (such as the days before or after yesterday), or would you like to look for all reminders regardless of date? Let me know how you’d like to proceed!
